snippets.name: Git: Pretty Log
snippets.description: Display last 10 commits in a pretty format with graph

snippets.name: Git: Status Porcelain
snippets.description: Show git status in short format

snippets.content:
TABLE without ID
FROM #project
WHERE status = "active"
SORT priority DESC
snippets.name: Dataview: Active Projects
snippets.description: List all active projects sorted by priority

snippets.content:
LIST
FROM #meeting
WHERE date(file.ctime) = date(today)
SORT file.ctime DESC
snippets.name: Dataview: Today's Meetings
Terminal: Clean Old Logs
snippets.description: Delete log files older than 7 days

snippets.content:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Starting backup..."
tar -czf backup-$(date +%Y%m%d).tar.gz /important/data
echo "Backup complete!"
